summary: Committed and highly dedicated professional with over fifteen years of extensive experience teaching, counseling, and mentoring people from diverse backgrounds. Experienced in planning and implementing intervention plans. Possessing excellent diagnostic, behavioral intervention, and behavioral monitoring skills.
skills: Specialist with building relationships with students and parents

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Instructed sixty 5th grade students in Reading and Language Arts; created and supervised school-wide writing plan; designed and implemented creative units aligned with Common Core; analyzed and utilized student data to modify instruction; integrated Promethean and Study Island technology; conducted school-wide workshops on Common Core.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Instructed all-male 4th grade class in all subject areas; analyzed data to drive instruction; developed classroom management system and character education; used diverse instructional techniques.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Designed and instructed single gender male 4th grade class in Mathematics and Reading; used differentiated teaching styles; implemented Promethean Board technology; incorporated character education as motivational tool.

experience.title: Academy Director
experience.description: Supervised teacher evaluations; led weekly administrative meetings; managed suspensions and behavior incidents; created master schedules; coordinated administrative duties.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Taught five all-male 8th grade students; implemented direct balanced literacy program; used whole language approach to Reading and Social Studies; aligned to state and district standards.

experience.title: Corporate Trainer
experience.description: Formed and presented training curriculum for new hire orientation and diversity seminars; guided classrooms, e-learning and virtual seminars for domestic and international audiences.

experience.title: Teacher
experience.description: Instructed eighth grade Science and Technology; developed mentoring program to increase parental participation.

education.degree: Master of Education: Reading and Literacy Development
